sourcesContent:
Inactive Users

  • {{ user }} | Set to Active
import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inactive-users', templateUrl: './inactive-users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inactive-users.component.css'] }) export class InactiveUsersComponent { users: string[] = []; onSetToActive(id: number) { this.userSetToActive.emit(id); } }
